about_the_game:
“Stellar Commanders - Bonus Content" features all the tiny things that make our Deluxe Edition extra special. It is a collection of tiny things we did during the development Process of Stellar Commanders, we hope you like it

Craft-able Commander Stands and Unit Cards:

Would you like to have all units at your fingertips to compare? Or report to your higher commander at a daily basis? Cut out, fold and glue these paper-craft unit cards and commander stands and have them ready at your desk. Nice!
The unit cards and commanders come as A4 CMYK pdfs to view electronically or print out.

Stellar Commanders Launch Poster:

Would you like to hang something of Stellar Commanders at your wall, but the unit cards look weird? This is the first big promotional poster we did for Stellar Commanders and we’d like to share it with you to be able to print it yourself.
The poster comes as an A1 CMYK pdf to view electronically or print out.

Exclusive Wallpaper “War on tiny planets”:

One of the promotional visuals of the game, remastered in up to 4K as a desktop wallpaper. Comes in a flavour of different sizes and screen ratio and makes your computer fell like he’s in space.
The wallpaper comes as a high res jpg in the resolutions 3840x2160, 1920x1080, 1600x0900, 1536x0864, 1440x0900 and 1366x0760

This is a little extra for each one of you throws in a few bucks into our tip jar. We want thank you so much for all your support!

Please Note: once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game’s root installation directory under “DLC”.
